result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Alexis T Thompson

records.addlTxt: Letter from DPU; defn has been accepted and contract will terminate 6/29/23

Your signature bond is set in the amount of $500 per case. You may be responsible for paying this amount if you miss a court date or do not follow conditions of your release. 
- Defendant shall be within their residence between the hours of 9:00 p.m. and 5:00 a.m unless commuting to or from work OR working a shit.
Trial Judge - Br 12

10:25 AM Prosecuting attorney Tomas Fernando Valerio in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Alexis T Thompson in court.  Attorney Amy M Johnson in court for Alexis T Thompson. Parties stipulate to amending bail form. CT amends "Defendant shall be within their residence between the hours of 9:00 p.m. and 5:00 a.m" to "Defendant shall be within their residence betwee the hours of 9:00pm and 5:00am unless commuting to or from work OR working a shift." ALL OTHER CONDITIONS REMAIN THE SAME.

10:07 AM Prosecuting attorney Tomas Fernando Valerio in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Alexis T Thompson in court.  Attorney Amy M Johnson in court for Alexis T Thompson. Plea Questionnaire & Waiver of Rights Signed. Def entered a plea of guilty to ct 1. Court accepted def's plea to ct 1 but w/h adjudication and referred def to FOP. Bail continued.
Plea hearing on August 5, 2022 at 09:30 am.

3:03 PM Prosecuting attorney Timothy Robert Verhoff in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Alexis T Thompson in court.  Attorney Amy M Johnson in court for Alexis T Thompson. Plea hearing. Defn requests set over, no objection by State. CT grants request, notice given to Defn in court.
Plea hearing scheduled for August 5, 2022 at 09:30 am.
Plea hearing on August 3, 2022 at 02:15 pm.

08:55 AM Attorney Amy M Johnson in court on behalf of defendant.  Hector Al-Homsi appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defn not in court. Plea hearing. State not asking for warrant, parties agree to set over. Address verified.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt: Pre-trial conference on July 15, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Your signature bond is set in the amount of $500 per case. You may be responsible for paying this amount if you miss a court date or do not follow conditions of your release. 
- Defendant shall be within their residence between the hours of 9:00 p.m. and 5:00 a.m. 
Trial Judge - Br 12

03:25 PM Defendant in court, in custody with Attorney Will Rice Anderson.  Thersa Louise Lewandowski appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  The defendant was advised regarding their right to an attorney and to the SPD application process if not already represented. Defendant received a copy of the Complaint and waived reading. Court entered Not Guilty pleas as to any misdemeanor counts.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for July 15, 2022 at 08:30 am.
